AlbumBook.title: Digital Photoagraphy
AlbumBook.description: A sample portfolio of my photography%2E

Slide.caption: This image was created by combining a sky from an older picture with this couch that I brought to a drive%2Din movie theater%2E
Taken at a drive%2Din theater in Idaho%2E Edge effect created using the art history brush in Photoshop%2E
Edited with Camera Raw%2E The image was originally almost totally blacked out%2E
Edited with Camera Raw%2E Increase saturation and clarity with adjustment brushes%2E
Edited with Camera Raw%2E Increase saturation and clarity with adjustment brushes%2E
Edited with Camera Raw%2E Increase saturation and added a vignette%2E
Taken during my 2 year LDS mission in Nevada%2E
Used airbrush technique to soften and smooth skin tone%2E
Edited with Camera Raw%2E Increased sharpness and added vignette%2E
Increased saturation and clarity with Camera Raw%2E
Blended self portrait with a scenic photograph in Rexburg, Idaho. Added typography in Photoshop.
